channel.title: Problom getting easyrsc online for others to play
channel.description: ok ive looked at a few tuts and i noticed that theres no world.xml in easyrsc could this be affecting the game i have my port forwarded correctly and my firewalls allow the ports threw but is it just the conf.xml and the client settings that have to be changed? i keep seeing this world.xml when i look for rscd tuts but it dont exist in this....

item.title: Problom getting easyrsc online for others to play
item.dc:creator: @dizzle11 dizzle11
item.description:
@dizzle11 wrote:

well ive tryed and it dosnt seem to go and even my friend tryed and hes go games running threw pf and it wont go on his comp eather but the both run localhost np

could it maybe be cuz i have my external ip and not my computers ip in the settings?
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 09, 2009, 12:55:03 pm[/size][hr]well i think the connection is getting threw cuz it doesnt say unable to connect to internet settiings it says error-server timed out but still no connections it just says that over and over again

Read full topic

item.title: Problom getting easyrsc online for others to play
item.dc:creator: @meatstick meatstick
item.description:
@meatstick wrote:

Because there is no loginserver and it doesn’t use mySQL, all you need to do is to portforward.

Read full topic
